subject: Re: Calib,
author: Adriana Jones
full_text:
So, if someone sick in the head ends up in a dark place, what happens to someone who has Alzheimer's before they die?  (This is a serious question, btw, I'm curious if that would have any effect on where they end up...)  Anyone know?

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, SnowfireL@... wrote:
>
> Tech David told me about this one guy over there, who always says one word, 
>  that seems to be he only word he knows, its "hore."  Don't take it  
> seriously because David the Tech, says that this fella is "sick in the head"  when 
> he was a little boy women had rapped him and he was later murdered as a  
> teen.  He grew up over there, however he is mental, and needs prayer he  
> doesn't seem to have anyone to move him on.  David asked me to have you  folks 
> all say a little prayer for Calib that he may get better over there, so he  
> may move on, he is stuck in a partial dark plane because he has mind damage.  
> Tks. sf
>
